document.full_text: prosecutors in rome ordered the release on wednesday of 23 million euros, or almost $33 million, seized from the vatican bank last year in a continuing money-laundering investigation.
document.title: europe: italy: money seized from vatican bank is released
lines_and_colors: prosecutors in rome ordered the release on wednesday of 23 million euros, or almost $33 million, seized from the vatican bank last year in a continuing money-laundering investigation.
